nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars - 3-CD Box, also known as The Clone Wars - 3-CD Hörspielbox Vol.1, was a CD box set first released in 2013 that collected the first three albums in Universal Music's 22-disc series of audio adaptations of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The box set collects album 1, The Clone Wars: Der Hinterhalt · Der Angriff Der Malevolence; album 2, The Clone Wars: Der Schatten Der Malevolence · Die Zerstörung Der Malevolence, and album 3, The Clone Wars: Rekruten · Der Fall Eines Droiden. As each album adapted two episodes of the original series, the box set contains adaptations of episodes 1 through 6 of season 1.
